Experience and Competence

Summary | 自我介绍

Five Year Well Engineer with experience in Design and Operations roles delivering value in North and South American Unconventional plays. Aiming to improve integration between disciplines and increase the value of overall project delivery; while building technical depth and leadership. Pursuing a Masters degree in Computer Science to implement digitalization in oil and gas, and to further society by improving and changing the way the world accesses and uses data. Fluent in Mandarin Chinese, with a deep interest and passion for Chinese culture and society. Other interests include sustainability, hiking, and an appreciation for minimalist, efficient design.

我的中文名是史马克，现任壳牌资深钻井工程师，同时也在莱斯大学攻读计算机科学研究生学位。 作为一位五年经验的工程师， 我领导过几个壳牌在北美和南美跨部门的大项目。我学习计算机不仅是为了利用大数据 来提高石油行业的工作效率，更加是想帮助社会搭建并完善数据化体系来提高人们的生活和工作质量。 我的业余兴趣爱好是学习中国文化和传统。除此之外我也喜欢爬山，非常关注有关环保的话题并崇尚极简主义。

Experience | 工作经验

Staff Wells Engineer

August 2018 - Current

Shell, Global Unconventionals Theme Office

  • Project ownership of casing design for multiple Unconventional basins.
  • Front End Lead for Engineering Design and Feasibility analysis, field development and trajectory planning, and liaison with Asset teams and business planning.
  • Subject Matter Expert in Well Cost Engineering.
  • Supervision of Intern personnel and mentoring of younger staff.

Wells Engineer

June 2016 - August 2018

Shell, Unconventional Wells and Logistics

  • Delivered wells as Appalachia Operations Engineer.
  • Permian, Apalachia Wells Front End Engineering Design Focal Point.
  • Execution of performance improvement initiatives, root cause failure analysis.

Wells Supervisor

July 2014 - June 2016

Shell, Appalachia Wells

  • Drilling supervisor across 2 rigs (20 - 30 personnel on location) for onshore Unconventional asset.
